root.name: Just Breed
root.description: OverviewJust Breed is a strategy RPG developed by Random House and was published by Enix for the Famicom on December 15, 1992. The game is famous for its long three year development history and its reputation for being the largest RPG for the system, 6 megabits. Just Breed was never released outside of Japan but an English patch was created by Stealth Translations in 2004.
